data.frame(dist = seq(1,15,.001)) %>% 
  mutate(`Driving/Transit` = ifelse(dist <= 10, 1/(.5*dist/20), 0), 
         Cycling = ifelse(dist <= 2.5, 1/(1*dist/10), 0), 
         Walking = ifelse(dist <= 1.5, 1/(1*dist/6), 0)) %>% 
  gather(md,coef, -dist) %>% 
  mutate(md = fct_relevel(md, \Driving/Transit\"
